mapper.select: select * from DEF_FUNCTION WHERE ISACTIVE = 'Y' AND ADMIN_FUNC = 'Y' order by FUNCTION_CODE

select * FROM DEF_ACTION a,DEF_FUNCTION b WHERE a.FUNCTION_CODE = b.FUNCTION_CODE AND a.FUNCTION_CODE IN ( SELECT FUNCTION_CODE FROM DEF_PRIVILEGE WHERE MASTER_CODE = #{role_code} and enable = 'Y' ) AND a.ISACTIVE = 'Y' AND b.ISACTIVE = 'Y' order by a.FUNCTION_CODE

select * FROM DEF_ACTION a,DEF_FUNCTION b WHERE a.FUNCTION_CODE = b.FUNCTION_CODE AND a.FUNCTION_CODE IN ( SELECT FUNCTION_CODE FROM DEF_PRIVILEGE WHERE MASTER_CODE = #{group_code} and enable = 'Y' ) AND a.ISACTIVE = 'Y' AND b.ISACTIVE = 'Y' order by a.FUNCTION_CODE

select * FROM DEF_ACTION a,DEF_FUNCTION b WHERE a.FUNCTION_CODE = b.FUNCTION_CODE AND a.FUNCTION_CODE IN ( SELECT FUNCTION_CODE FROM DEF_PRIVILEGE WHERE MASTER_CODE = #{user_id} and enable = 'Y' ) AND a.ISACTIVE = 'Y' AND b.ISACTIVE = 'Y' order by a.FUNCTION_CODE
select * FROM DEF_ACTION a,DEF_FUNCTION b WHERE a.FUNCTION_CODE = b.FUNCTION_CODE AND b.ADMIN_FUNC = 'Y' AND a.ISACTIVE = 'Y' AND b.ISACTIVE = 'Y' order by a.FUNCTION_CODE
